word: Our children are to be educated line upon line, precept upon precept, here a little and there a little. From babyhood the character of the child is to be molded and fashioned in accordance with the divine plan. Virtues are to be instilled into its opening mind.--Ms 49, 1901, pp. 5, 6, 8. ("Work Out Your Own Salvation," June 26, 1901.)
